attributes.action: Support marriage between Heterosexuals as the best environment to bring up children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Political correctness, moral relativism and the secular lobby are destroying the last bastions of stability for our childrens future.  
Tax incentives no longer provide a clear message that Marriage is still the best environment to bring up children.  The Government needs to promote marriage, above that of other relationships.
